label: MILL #1
info:
eine Schnittstelle, die den lokalen MQTT-Broker mit
dem OPCUA-Server der Fraese verbindet.

name: handle-actions
info: Flow to handle orders and instantActions

name: load-factsheet
info:
This flow is used to load a factsheet from the filesystem with the provided path.
Use the configuration of the subflow instance to set the path to the factsheet.

Remember that it has to be an absolute filepath, otherwise the file will be loaded 
relative to the work directory of the Node-RED process.

name: get-opcua-address
info:
Retrieves an environment variable from the list of global environment variables
and sets it to `msg.endpoint` for use with the Flex Connector.

update-calibration-data
Order to take Picture
func:
/**
 * @typedef {object} Reference
 * @property {string} referenceKey
 * @property {number} referenceValue
 * 
 * @typedef {object} ActionMetadata
 * @property {string} [position]
 * @property {boolean} [factory]
 * @property {Reference[]} [references]
 * 
 * @typedef {object} Action
 * @property {"startCalibration" 
 *    | "stopCalibration" 
 *    | "setCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "storeCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "selectCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "testCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "resetCalibration"} actionType
 * @property {string} actionId
 * @property {ActionMetadata} metadata
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationInstantAction
 * @property {string} serialNumber
 * @property {Date} timestamp
 * @property {Action[]} actions
 * 
 * @typedef {object} ReferenceData
 * @property {string} referenceKey
 * @property {number} referenceValue
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationData
 * @property {string} infoType
 * @property {string} infoLevel
 * @property {ReferenceData[]} infoReferences
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationValue
 * @property {string} nodeId
 * @property {string} nodeName
 * @property {string} nodeValue
 *
 * @typedef {object} PositionTargetData
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_dreh
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_x
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_y
 */

const moduleState = flow.get("moduleState");
if (moduleState == "CALIBRATION") {
    return {
        topic: flow.get("TXT_MQTT_topic") + "/order",
        payload: {
            serialNumber: flow.get("serialNumber"),
            orderId: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
            orderUpdateId: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10),
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
            action: {
                id: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
                command: "CHECK_QUALITY",
                metadata: {}
            },
        }
    };
    return msg;
} else {
    // Ignore Message, if Module is not in calibration mode
    return;
}

/**
 * @typedef {object} Reference
 * @property {string} referenceKey
 * @property {number} referenceValue
 * 
 * @typedef {object} ActionMetadata
 * @property {string} [position]
 * @property {boolean} [factory]
 * @property {Reference[]} [references]
 * 
 * @typedef {object} Action
 * @property {"startCalibration" 
 *    | "stopCalibration" 
 *    | "setCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "storeCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "selectCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "testCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "resetCalibration"} actionType
 * @property {string} actionId
 * @property {ActionMetadata} metadata
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationInstantAction
 * @property {string} serialNumber
 * @property {Date} timestamp
 * @property {Action[]} actions
 * 
 * @typedef {object} ReferenceData
 * @property {string} referenceKey
 * @property {number} referenceValue
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationData
 * @property {string} infoType
 * @property {string} infoLevel
 * @property {ReferenceData[]} infoReferences
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationValue
 * @property {string} nodeId
 * @property {string} nodeName
 * @property {string} nodeValue
 *
 * @typedef {object} PositionTargetData
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_dreh
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_x
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_y
 */

const moduleState = flow.get("moduleState");
if (moduleState == "CALIBRATION") {
    return {
        topic: flow.get("TXT_MQTT_topic") + "/order",
        payload: {
            serialNumber: flow.get("serialNumber"),
            orderId: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
            orderUpdateId: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10),
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
            action: {
                id: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
                command: "CHECK_QUALITY",
                metadata: {}
            },
        }
    };
    return msg;
} else {
    // Ignore Message, if Module is not in calibration mode
    return;
}

/**
 * @typedef {object} Reference
 * @property {string} referenceKey

 * 
 * @typedef {object} ActionMetadata
 * @property {string} [position]
 * @property {boolean} [factory]
 * @property {Reference[]} [references]
 * 
 * @typedef {object} Action
 * @property {"startCalibration" 
 *    | "stopCalibration" 
 *    | "setCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "storeCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "selectCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "testCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "resetCalibration"} actionType
 * @property {string} actionId
 * @property {ActionMetadata} metadata
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationInstantAction
 * @property {string} serialNumber
 * @property {Date} timestamp

 * @typedef {object} ReferenceData

 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationData

 * @property {ReferenceData[]} infoReferences
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationValue
 * @property {string} nodeId
 * @property {string} nodeName
 * @property {string} nodeValue
 *
 * @typedef {object} PositionTargetData
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_dreh
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_x
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_y
 */

const moduleState = flow.get("moduleState");
if (moduleState == "CALIBRATION") {
    return {
        topic: flow.get("TXT_MQTT_topic") + "/order",
        payload: {
            serialNumber: flow.get("serialNumber"),
            orderId: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
            orderUpdateId: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10),
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
            action: {
                id: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
                command: "CHECK_QUALITY",
                metadata: {}
            },
        }

    return msg;
} else {
    // Ignore Message, if Module is not in calibration mode
    return;
}

/**
 * @typedef {object} Reference
 * @property {string} referenceKey
 * @property {number} referenceValue
 * 
 * @typedef {object} ActionMetadata
 * @property {string} [position]
 * @property {boolean} [factory]
 * @property {Reference[]} [references]
 * 
 * @typedef {object} Action
 * @property {"startCalibration" 
 *    | "stopCalibration" 
 *    | "setCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "storeCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "selectCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "testCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "resetCalibration"} actionType
 * @property {string} actionId
 * @property {ActionMetadata} metadata
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationInstantAction
 * @property {string} serialNumber
 * @property {Date} timestamp
 * @property {Action[]} actions

 * @typedef {object} CalibrationData

 * @property {ReferenceData[]} infoReferences
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationValue
 * @property {string} nodeId

 * @property {string} nodeValue
 *
 * @typedef {object} PositionTargetData
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_dreh
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_x
 * @property {number | string | undefined} position_y
 */

const moduleState = flow.get("moduleState");
if (moduleState == "CALIBRATION") {
    return {
        topic: flow.get("TXT_MQTT_topic") + "/order",
        payload: {
            serialNumber: flow.get("serialNumber"),
            orderId: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
            orderUpdateId: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10),
            timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
            action: {
                id: `CHECK_QUALITY__${Date.now()}`,
                command: "CHECK_QUALITY",
                metadata: {}
            },
        }
    };
    return msg;
} else {
    // Ignore Message, if Module is not in calibration mode
    return;
}

Early instantAction finish

name: cancelStorageOrder
cancelStorageOrder
info:
cancelStorageOrder is similar to announceOutput.
The difference is that it discards the workpiece 
after the order has been sent and leves the module idle.
Any new order will be accepted.

name: announceOutput
info:
announceOutput will be received when the factory 
wants to deliver a manufactured workpiece to the DPS.
Do nothing if the DPS is idle.
Any input process is aborted if it is ongoing, 
unless the storage order has been sent already.

name: publish errorState
reset
func:
/**
 * @typedef {object} ActionMetadata
 * @property {string} [position]
 * @property {boolean} [factory]
 * @property {{referenceKey: string, referenceValue: number}[]} [references]
 * 
 * @typedef {object} Action
 * @property {"startCalibration" 
 *    | "stopCalibration" 
 *    | "setCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "storeCalibrationValues" 
 *    | "selectCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "testCalibrationPosition" 
 *    | "resetCalibration"} actionType
 * @property {string} actionId
 * @property {ActionMetadata} metadata
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationInstantAction
 * @property {string} serialNumber
 * @property {Date} timestamp
 * @property {Action[]} actions
 * 
 * @typedef {object} ReferenceData
 * @property {string} referenceKey
 * @property {number} referenceValue
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationData
 * @property {string} infoType
 * @property {string} infoLevel
 * @property {ReferenceData[]} infoReferences
 * 
 * @typedef {object} CalibrationValue
 * @property {string} nodeId
 * @property {string} nodeName
 * @property {string} nodeValue
 */

msg.payload = {
    nodetype: 'inject',
    injectType: 'write',
    nodesToWrite: [
        { nodeId: "ns=4;i=42", "datatypeName": "Boolean" }
    ],
    valuesToWrite: [
        { value: true }
    ]
};
return msg;
